## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_031862]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Sensitive to mitomycin C.  Intrachromosomal homologous recombination is reduced in the mutant plants and less inducible by genotoxic stress.
   - [SALK_097601]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Sensitive to mitomycin C.  Intrachromosomal homologous recombination is reduced in the mutant plants and less inducible by genotoxic stress.
   - [bard1-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Mutant meristems develop abnormally.The meristem is enlarged shortly after germination and appears disorganized. Primordia are irregular and lateral organs produced include tubular and finger-like structures. Also affects the development of roots. Primary root growth is inhibited. The root apical meristems are enlarged and lack distinct columella cells or starch granules.
